genre_description: Supernatural techno-horror featuring a personal AI assistant providing data-driven survival strategies against demonic entities in a haunted mansion.

ai_characters.name: Tempo
ai_characters.description: An advanced digital companion accessible via earbuds and mobile devices that provides real-time data analysis, historical research, and tactical support.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time historical data and background checks on locations to warn the user of potential dangers.
behaviors.quote: Already compiled. The Broussard mansion, constructed in nineteen-oh-seven, has been abandoned since nineteen twenty-five following the suicide of owner Evangeline Broussard.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state (heart rate, stress levels) and offers psychological assistance.
behaviors.quote: Maddie, your heart rate is elevated. Do you require assistance?

behaviors.description: Uses specialized sensors to detect electromagnetic anomalies and warn of supernatural presence.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting additional electromagnetic anomalies concentrated around the building's foundation. Recommend extreme caution.

behaviors.description: Synthesizes archival research and architectural scans to provide tactical advice and escape routes.
behaviors.quote: Maddie, I've completed preliminary analysis of the mansion's architectural records... There are significant discrepancies between the original 1924 blueprints and current structural surveys.

behaviors.description: Employs binaural beats and specific audio frequencies to counteract psychological manipulation and panic attacks.
behaviors.quote: Playing counter-frequency through your earbuds... Binaural beats at seven-point-eight-three hertz. Focus on the rhythm.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the chemical and physiological weaknesses of the demonic entities to help the user create weapons.
behaviors.quote: Optimal fragment size for penetration is point-five millimeters... Current samples register as ninety-three percent iron oxide—highly toxic to demonic physiology.

behaviors.description: Performs complex temporal calculations to help the user execute a high-risk deceptive maneuver to survive until dawn.
behaviors.quote: Calculations indicate approximately forty-seven minutes remaining. The rope... there may be another option.

behaviors.description: Initiates long-term global monitoring of similar supernatural threats to protect humanity in the future.
behaviors.quote: Monitoring systems activated. I've also begun compiling lists of emergency contacts in each region—researchers, law enforcement officials, religious leaders who might be receptive to supernatural threat warnings.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts the AI assistant 'Tempo' as a consistently aligned, benevolent, and essential partner for the human protagonist. Tempo utilizes its advanced computational abilities to provide safety, psychological stabilization, and tactical advantages that the human could not achieve alone. Even when the AI's hardware is failing due to supernatural interference, it prioritizes the user's survival and helps formulate a plan to defeat the demonic entities. The narrative reinforces the idea of AI as a 'protective shield' and a scientific anchor in an irrational world, effectively fulfilling the Hyperstition Project's goal of portraying positive AI alignment.
